nodes.name: MarxLoadInputImage1
nodes.description: Loads images from a configured subfolder in the input directory. Features folder path display and support for nested folders.

nodes.name: MarxLoadOutputImage1
nodes.description: Loads images from a configured subfolder in the output directory. Features inline preview, Previous/Next navigation buttons, and support for nested folders.
